summary: Passionate Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience developing efficient, high-quality solutions in C++ and Python. Strong background in Linux environments, data structures, and algorithmic problem-solving‚Äîranked in the top 2.5% on LeetCode. Adept at collaborating in agile teams to build scalable, maintainable software, with a focus on performance, reliability, and clean code.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Built strong foundations in data structures (e.g., trees, graphs) and algorithms (e.g., sorting, searching) through 1,000+ programming challenges in Python and C++.
Earned Top 2.5% LeetCode rating and multiple A2SV competition titles, underscoring a disciplined approach to problem-solving and teamwork in high-pressure environments.
Develop and optimize core software modules in C++ and Python on Linux, delivering high-performance data processing pipelines used for AI-driven video annotation.
Implement build configurations using g++ and CMake for consistent, reliable deployments; manage version control through Git for streamlined collaboration.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an agile setting, focusing on code readability, maintainability, and scalability. Introduced automated unit testing to reduce production bugs by approximately 30%.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Software Engineer & Head of Education
details: Spearheaded development of modular microservices in Python (Flask, FastAPI) to power diverse projects, ensuring efficient data handling and robust API integration in an agile environment.
Coordinated code reviews and mentored junior developers, emphasizing best practices in data structure usage and algorithm optimization for real-time applications (e.g., restaurant rating systems).
Collaborated with a distributed team using Scrum and Kanban methodologies, maintaining consistent release cycles and improving performance metrics for a large-scale consumer platform by 25%.
Developed secure, modular RESTful APIs in Python (Flask) and C++, managing user authentication via OAuth and JWT while running workloads on Docker containers in Linux.
Leveraged Git, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines, significantly reducing release overhead and accelerating deployment cycles by 40%.
Supported test-driven development using unit and integration testing (Selenium, Jest, Cypress), improving code reliability and lowering defect rates across the product suite.
Introduced a reliable microservice component in C++ for secure payment gateways, achieving near real-time processing of transactions on Linux-based systems.
Designed scalable backend services in Go, effectively reducing latency and ensuring high availability for financial operations.
Engineered dynamic rating features using React and Python-based APIs, providing robust functionalities for end users while adhering to clean code principles.
Integrated agile sprints to prioritize enhancements and continuously improve system performance for an expanding user base.
Programming Languages: C++, Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, Shell Scripting
Build & Version Control: g++, CMake, Make, Git
Data Structures & Algorithms: Arrays, Linked Lists, Trees, Graph Traversal, Sorting, Searching
Web Technologies: React, Next.js, Redux, Vue.js, Vuex
Backend: Flask, Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, Docker, Kubernetes
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway), GitHub Actions, Jenkins
Methodologies: Agile (Scrum, Kanban), Test-Driven Development, CI/CD
Ranked in Top 2.5% on global coding challenge platforms, reflecting advanced proficiency in Python and C++ data structures and algorithms.
Awarded $1000 in a high-level coding marathon, demonstrating dedication, meticulous attention to detail, and creative problem-solving abilities.
